mil7.7.2:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘thanassitadārakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.2:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, thanassitadārako sadatthe laggati, khīratthiko rodati;
mil7.7.2:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena sadatthe laggitabbaṃ, sabbattha dhammañāṇena bhavitabbaṃ, uddese paripucchāya sammappayoge paviveke garusaṃvāse kalyāṇamittasevane.
mil7.7.2:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, thanassitadārakassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.7.2:5.5: Bhāsitampetaṃ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena dīghanikāyavare parinibbānasuttante—
mil7.7.2:6.1: ‘Iṅgha tumhe, ānanda, sāratthe ghaṭatha, sāratthe anuyuñjatha, sāratthe appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathā’”ti.
